name: Grappler

auras.raw_description: Increases Spirit Ally HP in all Battles by 19%.

skills.name: Hoodoo
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 2 times at random. Has a 15% chance of placing a 15% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Soul Sizzle
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing two 2.5% [Poison] debuffs for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Envelop
skills.raw_description:
Places a [Shield] buff on all allies equal to 20% of their HP and a 15% {Reflect Damage] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Shield +5%
Lvl. 3 Shield +5%
Lvl. 4 Shield +5%
Lvl. 5 Shield +5%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
